binding:binding.name: UPnP Control Binding
binding:binding.description: This binding acts as a UPnP Control Point that can query media server content directories and serve content to media renderers.

parameter.name: path
parameter.label: Storage Path
parameter.description: Folder path for playlists and favourites. If not set, it will default to $OPENHAB_USERDATA/upnpcontrol. The folder will be created on first use when it does not exist.

parameter.name: removalGracePeriod
parameter.label: Removal Grace Period
parameter.description: Extra grace period (seconds) that UPnP discovery shall wait before removing a lost device from the Inbox. Default is 50 seconds.
